labels.analysis: The MCP Server is focused on providing comprehensive financial data retrieved from Yahoo Finance. Its primary functionality revolves around accessing real-time and historical stock market information, including prices, financial statements, dividends, news, and analyst recommendations. The tools available enable users to perform various types of financial queries, making it useful for financial analysis, investment tracking, and market research.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Financial Services" is chosen because the server primarily provides financial data and tools that are essential for financial analysis and investment decisions. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" is chosen because the server acts as a gateway to retrieving financial information from Yahoo Finance, which is a form of specialized web-based research. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is included because the tools can be used to gather and analyze financial data for various purposes.

tools.name: get_current_stock_price
tools.description: Get the current stock price based on stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

tools.name: get_stock_price_by_date
tools.description: Get the stock price for a given stock symbol on a specific date.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

tools.name: get_stock_price_date_range
tools.description: Get the stock prices for a given date range for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

start_date.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

tools.name: get_historical_stock_prices
tools.description: Get historical stock prices for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

period.description: The period for historical data. Defaults to "1mo". Valid periods: "1d", "5d", "1mo", "3mo", "6mo", "1y", "2y", "5y", "10y", "ytd", "max"

interval.description: The interval beween data points. Defaults to "1d". Valid intervals: "1d", "5d", "1wk", "1mo", "3mo"

tools.name: get_dividends
tools.description: Get dividends for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

tools.name: get_income_statement
tools.description: Get income statement for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

freq.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid freqencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trainling"

tools.name: get_cashflow
tools.description: Get cashflow for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

freq.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid freqencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trainling"

tools.name: get_earning_dates
tools.description: Get earning dates.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

limit.description: max amount of upcoming and recent earnings dates to return. Default value 12 should return next 4 quarters and last 8 quarters. Increase if more history is needed.

tools.name: get_news
tools.description: Get news for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

tools.name: get_recommendations
tools.description: Get analyst recommendations for a given symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

server_info_crawled.name: Yahoo Finance Data Server
server_info_crawled.author: @maxscheijen/mcp-yahoo-finance
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time and historical financial data from Yahoo Finance to enhance your LLM applications. Access stock prices, company information, and perform comparative financial queries seamlessly. Enable your agents to interact with financial markets data effortlessly through standardized tools.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@maxscheijen/mcp-yahoo-finance/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
